rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, what have we here! Been a while
since I last saw Drivers and Blades who
aren't in the Imperial Army.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Tell you what, I'll give you
a little tip for free.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A Driver's element is determined by
the Blade they happen to be using.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0004
rows.name:
So if you're using a wind-element
Blade, your attacks are going to be
wind-element as well.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0005
rows.name:
And certain elements are opposed
to each other, as well.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0006
rows.name:
For instance, if you use a fire-element
Blade to attack a water-element
monster, you'll do more damage.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Switching between Blades based on
the enemy you're facing is a pretty
important tactic.
